title: Black Ops 3 Repack Status
body:
Updated Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 repack has beaten my own Far Cry 4 repack in terms of complexity. It’s huge, it has so many different types of data, tenths of thousands of audiofiles for every language… Number of possible language/modes combinations also add up a lot of work.

It’s good I always make notes, so next games on this engine will be repacked faster.

No ETA and final sizes yet, I’ll keep you posted.
